_sText:
de_chessyard

Created by Eschaton/Steely Glint

In the courtyard of an old monastary, a game of chess is being played with pieces twice as tall as a man and as heavy as a buick.

The terrorists must bomb either the white king or the white queen.
The counter-terrorists must stop them.

de_ChessYard v1.0

Created by Eschaton/Steely Glint, December 2004

The terrorists must destroy either the white king or the white queen.
The counterterrorists must stop them.

In the courtyard of an old monastary, a game of chess is being played with pieces twice as tall as a man and as heavy as a buick. The chess pieces in the courtyard are in position to recreate the configuration of one of the most famous chess games ever played.

Server admins are granted the right to use this map on their servers without acknowledgment, but if you want to include it in a bundle or use it in some way other than running on a server, drop me a line at [realesch@yahoo.com]. I don't check this email address very often, so don't be suprised if it takes we a while to respond.

If you want to comment on the map, ask questions about it, or just shoot the shit with me, I already gave you one of my email addresses in the paragraph above. What, you're too lazy to look up there?
